document.discussion_title: Armed Offenders Squad helps with search warrant in Hamilton
document.topic_text: A man has been arrested after police, including the Armed Offenders Squad, searched a Hamilton property. Police went to Bruce Avenue in Glenview about 5pm on Friday to execute a search warrant. A 40-year-old man was arrested without incident, Senior Sergeant Greg Foster said. Police left the area after about half an hour, he said.

Police left the area after about half an hour, he said.
